description: This is a Flutter application's main source file defining the app's entry point, main widget, and home page with basic UI components.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application setting up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the home page UI, displaying a scaffold with an app bar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the app by invoking runApp with MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of MyApp and _MyHomePageState classes, constructing the widget tree for the app and home page.
